snippet.title: Tokyo Xtreme Racer: Drift 2 PS2 Gameplay HD (PCSX2)
snippet.description:
Tokyo Xtreme Racer Drift 2 PS2 Gameplay
Release Date: July 28, 2005 (JP); April 17, 2007 (NA)
Platforms: PlayStation 2
_____________________________________________
PCSX2 Settings:
Renderer: Direct3D11 (Hardware)
Interlacing (F5): Auto
Texture Filtering: Bilinear (PS2)
Internal Resolution: 8x Native
Anisotropic Filtering: 16x
Mipmapping: Basic (Fast)
CRC Hack Level: Automatic (Default)
_____________________________________________
(✓) Enable HW Hacks: 
(✓) Align Sprite
(✓) Wild Arms Offset
_____________________________________________
Requested by: AudiR8King (AR8K)
_____________________________________________
My PC Specs:
CPU: Intel Core i7-4790K
GPU: GeForce GTX 1070
Ram: 12GB
OS: Microsoft Windows 7 Ultimate
_____________________________________________

Enjoy !
